description: Last revised: May 01, 2023. This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which we collect, use, maintain, and disclose information collected from users (each, a 'User') of this website (the 'Site').

questions.title: What information do we collect?
questions.description: We collect and save personal information about the User, such as name, email and results of diagnostics.

questions.title: How We Use Collected Information?
questions.description: We use the photo submitted by the User solely for the purpose of analyzing the mole to help diagnose skin cancer. We do not use the photo or any other personal information for any other purpose, including marketing, advertising, or sharing with third parties.

questions.title: What do you consent to?
questions.description: By using our Site and submitting a photo, you consent to our collection, use, and storage of your photo as described in this Privacy Policy.

questions.title: What if privacy policy changes?
questions.description: We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time without prior notice. We encourage Users to frequently check this page for any changes. Your continued use of the Site after any changes to this Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of such changes.

questions.title: What if I still have questions?
questions.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us at skincancerstop.check@gmail.com.
